title: The Mystery Man
description: In this Dateline classic, a woman looking for love finds Mr. Right – but he soon pulls her into a dark world of undercover espionage where nothing is as it seems. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 25, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
